Room.Name: The Yellow Training Hut
Room.ShortDescription: Congratulations! You have earned your rank of Grunt, Second Class.
Room.LongDescription: The secret to a good and powerful barbarian is the ability to overpower opponents that are even more powerful than you. In order to advance to higher levels, you must be prepared to fight with a barbarian of the level you are applying for. Barbarians don't rise to power by being wimps.
